trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Bristol
There were no other sightings in Bristol on or around May 4th 2012
Summary: While watching a movie at the Twin City Drive-In,myself and several witness' notcied a bright white/orange light silently drop down and hover over the treetop mtn. range directly behind the drive-in movie screen. After a few minutes,the light just faded
divs: sighting detailswhile watching the avengers on opening night at the drive-in,myself and several witness noticed a bright white\orange non-blinking light silently drop down and hover at treetop level at the small mtn. range located directly behind the movie screen. while we were watching it,the light just...faded into nothing. one second it was there and then it was just gone.
